Name: Tunnel VR
About the game: ATTENTION!!! WE ARE CURRENTLY IN THE PROCESS OF CHANGING THIS GAME TO BE FREE TO PLAY. DO NOT BUY IT FOR MONEY. WAIT FOR IT TO BE FREE! This game is a few years old and might not be the best experience with modern VR hardware. Its gameplay and principles are based on a very different set or devices and might not be much fun today. Like racing trough endless tunnels in space? Then look no further, this is the game for you. Because it is all about racing. In a tunnel. In space. Sounds great? Yes it does! Tunnel VR is a procedural racing game. But the fun does not stop there. Periodically the tunnel changes and you will fly through venes and even a pizza tunnel. Made you hungry for the game? Good! Features: Endless Tunnel Fun! Are on a diet? Get your share of pizza in the pizzatunnel! See what fat does to your venes in the blood vessel tunnel! Play it in VR or with the mouse (but heroes play in VR)! Steam achievements to show of your tunnelskills! Three unique peices of music! The faster you go the more instruments will play because we couldn't afford to have them play the whole time!
